request.description: Get all active CRM stages ordered by their display order
Get a specific stage by its ID
Reorder stages by providing an array of stage IDs in the desired order (Admin only)
Get the next stage in the pipeline for moving opportunities forward
Get the previous stage in the pipeline for moving opportunities backward
Move an opportunity to a specific stage
Create a new opportunity (automatically assigned to Lead stage)
